comments:
When I debug my embedded target using JTAG debugger, there is no "info 
sharedlibrary" or threadlist.  CDT 2.0M5

CDT consoles flashes and exceptions are registered in log, but it seems to work 
just fine.

info sharedlibrary
Undefined info command: "sharedlibrary".  Try "help info".
info threads
warning: RMT ERROR : failed to get remote thread list

info sharedlibrary
Undefined info command: "sharedlibrary".  Try "help info".
